document_data.name: Glass-breakers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Glass-breakers''' were a group of fanatical [[gnomes]] who lived on an uncharted island in the middle of [[Yal Tengri]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The sole purpose of the Glass-breakers was to thwart the construction of the [[Great Spire of the Ice Sea]] that was being built by a cult of [[Gond]] ''circa'' [[1359 DR]]. They achieved this by executing nighttime raids on the spire where they damaged the spire, burned factories, and scared the workers.
document_data.Members: [[Lurdas Jasperstone]] organized the group of gnomes who would become the Glass-breakers.
